snippet: One day after the United States Navy rescued 13 Iranian fishermen from Somali pirates in the North Arabian Sea, the response from Iran ranged across a wide spectrum, from gratitude to suspicion.
abstract: One day after the United States Navy rescued 13 Iranian fishermen from Somali pirates in the North Arabian Sea, the response from Iran ranged across a wide spectrum, from gratitude to suspicion.

headline.main: Iranians React to U.S. Rescue of Fishermen
